item.title: デヴィッド・エリソンがCEOに就任するスカイダンスの「新生パラマウント」構想：クリエイターを引き込むための15億ドルの資金注入、テックへの注力など（Matt Donnelly/Variety）
item.description:
Matt Donnelly / Variety:
A look at Skydance's vision for “New Paramount”, of which David Ellison will be the CEO: a $1.5B cash infusion to help woo creatives, a focus on tech, and more  —  Now that Shari Redstone has signed on the dotted line to sell her father's media empire to Skydance and RedBird Capital, what future awaits?

item.title: リンクトインの共同創業者リード・ホフマンがスマートマティック社に投資、フォックス・ニュースとニューズマックスに対する高額な訴訟を維持するため（Jeremy Barr/Washington Post）
item.description:
Jeremy Barr / Washington Post:
LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman invests in Smartmatic, in part to help the company sustain its costly litigation against Fox News and Newsmax  —  LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman, a longtime funder of left-leaning causes, has invested in Smartmatic, the election technology company suing …

item.title: メモパラマウントの共同CEOによると、スカイダンス買収が完了するまで、パラマウントは人員削減を続け、資産の一部売却を検討するとのこと（Reuters）。
item.description:
Reuters:
Memo: Paramount's co-CEOs say Paramount will continue reducing the size of its workforce and look to divest some of its assets until the Skydance deal closes  —  Paramount Global (PARA.O) will continue reducing the size of its workforce until its merger with Skydance Media closes …

item.title: 億万長者ヴィンセント・ボローのフランスにおけるフォックス・ニュースのようなメディア帝国を後押しする重要な役割を果たしたフランスのテレビ司会者シリル・ハノウナのプロフィール（Leila Abboud/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Leila Abboud / Financial Times:
A profile of French TV presenter Cyril Hanouna, who has played an important role in boosting billionaire Vincent Bolloré's Fox News-like media empire in France  —  Cyril Hanouna is a key player in Vincent Bolloré's Fox News-like media empire  —  One way to understand …

item.title: メモシャリー・レッドストーンはスカイダンスに「将来の明確な戦略的ビジョンを持っている」と語り、パラマウントの共同CEOは2025年の買収完了までは「通常通りだ」と語る（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Memo: Shari Redstone says Skydance “have a clear strategic vision for the future”; Paramount co-CEOs say “it's business as usual” until the deal closes in 2025  —  Cheeks, McCarthy and Robbins say they will continue carrying out their restructuring plan, including layoffs and asset sales

item.title: COVID-19以降、パンデミックによる映画不足とDVDレンタルキオスクの減少により、収益が大きく落ち込んだRedboxの下降スパイラルを見てみよう（Janko Roettgers/The Verge）。
item.description:
Janko Roettgers / The Verge:
A look at Redbox's downward spiral since COVID-19, as pandemic-induced movie shortages and the declining number of DVD rental kiosks led to a big revenue drop  —  The bankruptcy of Redbox's parent company came after months of chaos, cash crunch, and corporate upheaval.

item.title: パラマウント・グローバル社とスカイダンス・メディア社が合併を発表。
item.description:
Dawn Chmielewski / Reuters:
Paramount Global and Skydance Media announce a merger of the two companies, ending months of chaotic talks; a memo says the deal is expected to close in H1 2025  —  Skydance Media and Paramount Global (PARA.O) agreed to merge, the companies announced late Sunday evening, opening a new chapter for one of Hollywood's oldest studios.

item.title: メモ：NineのPedestrian Groupがリストラされ、CEOが去り、スタッフが削減され、Vice、Gizmodo、Kotakuなどをオーストラリアで出版するライセンス契約が打ち切られる（Calum Jaspan/Sydney Morning Herald）。
item.description:
Calum Jaspan / Sydney Morning Herald:
Memo: Nine's Pedestrian Group restructures as CEO departs, staff faces cuts, and licensing deals to publish Vice, Gizmodo, Kotaku, others in Australia get axed  —  The chief executive of Nine-owned Pedestrian Group, Matt Rowley, will leave the youth publisher as part of a major restructure …

WURD says Biden's interview, with questions provided by his aides, was conducted without management knowledge and is parting ways with Andrea Lawful-Sanders  —  The Philadelphia radio host who admitted to using questions prepared by President Joe Biden's campaign in one of his first postdebate interviews …

item.title: 出典パラマウント取締役会の特別委員会がスカイダンス合併を承認、取締役会は本日にも買収を承認し、早ければ月曜日に発表（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Source: Paramount board's special committee approves Skydance merger; the board is set to approve the deal today, with an announcement coming as soon as Monday  —  - Transaction expected to be approved Sunday evening by board  — David Ellison's Skydance, Paramount have negotiated for months

item.title: アーティストが自分のスタイルをAIにコピーされるのを防ぐための無料ツール「Glaze」の「需要が爆発的に増加」するなか、その保護機能がバイパスされる可能性があると研究者が指摘する（Ashley Belanger/Ars Technica）。
item.description:
Ashley Belanger / Ars Technica:
As Glaze, a free tool to help artists prevent AI from copying their style, sees an “explosion in demand”, researchers say its protections can be bypassed  —  Artists must wait weeks for Glaze defense against AI scraping amid TOS updates.  —  For many artists, it's a precarious time to post art online.

item.title: 刑務所からNYT地方調査フェロー、ウィスコンシン・ウォッチ記者になるまで、大学のジャーナリズムの授業がどのように役立ったかを語る記者（マリオ・コーラン/ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Mario Koran / New York Times:
A reporter describes how college journalism classes helped him go from being in jail to becoming a NYT Local Investigations Fellow and Wisconsin Watch reporter  —  While serving a sentence for burglary, I enrolled in a college journalism class.  When I interviewed my correctional officer, my world broadened.

item.title: サウジアラビアがEsports World Cupを開催するにあたり、サウジアラビアの "スポーツウォッシング "を懸念している。
item.description:
Ben Church / CNN:
A look at concerns about Saudi Arabia “sportswashing”, as the country hosts the Esports World Cup; Saudi Arabia's PIF owns some of the biggest gaming companies  —  In the heart of Saudi Arabia's capital, a seismic moment for esports is underway; one which has triggered both excitement and concern across the industry.

item.title: サウジアラビアが出資し、リヤドで開催された第1回Esports World Cupは、1,500人以上のゲーマーが参加し、賞金総額は6,000万ドル以上となった。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
A look at the inaugural Esports World Cup, a multi-genre tournament in Riyadh funded by Saudi Arabia, featuring 1,500+ gamers and a record $60M+ prize pool  —  - Esports World Cup has record prize pool of $60 million  — Crown Prince MBS wants to build esports capital in Riyadh

item.title: バイデン補佐官は、7月3日にフィラデルフィアのWURDのThe Source、7月4日にウィスコンシンのWAUKのThe Earl Ingram Showのラジオ・インタビューに質問を提供した（マイケル・D・シアー/ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）。
item.description:
Michael D. Shear / New York Times:
Biden aides provided questions for radio interviews on The Source on Philadelphia's WURD, on July 3, and The Earl Ingram Show on Wisconsin's WAUK, on July 4  —  The host of “The Source” on WURD in Philadelphia said officials provided her with a list of eight questions to choose from.
